official_title: To amend the Truth in Savings Act to repeal the maximum amount limitation on certain recoveries for violations of such Act.
short_title: Truth in Savings Act Amendments of 1992

summary.text: Truth in Savings Act Amendment of 1992 - Amends the Truth in Savings Act to provide that no minimum or maximum amount of civil liability shall be applicable with respect to the liability of a non-complying depository institution towards each member account holder in a class action suit.

titles.title: Truth in Savings Act Amendments of 1992
To amend the Truth in Savings Act to repeal the maximum amount limitation on certain recoveries for violations of such Act.
